website_summaries.verdict: The portable Anker Soundcore Flare 2 speakers delivers solid audio and cool LED lights in a waterproof design for a fair price.
pros: Relatively solid audio for the size and price
LED light strips can flash various colors to the beat
cons: EQ in app cannot be customized

customer_reviews.title: Good bass, good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, it sounds better if you turn the bass up feature on (in my opinion) and the rgb lights look good, but the soundcore flare mini seems better value at £41.99 and sounds just as good but doesn't get as loud. So, if you don't need a really loud speaker i would recommend the flare mini over the flare2. And they are both ip67 water proof which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis riches

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good product, easily 12hrs although I always turn the LED's off. Dropped multiple times kver the past month and used near my shower daily and sti working great. I ordered x2 and the sound is very loud when paired and bass is turned on Although, there is lag in voices vs movie/tv show when paired together but it's just fine to listen from the one speaker . If they get to loud they can become tinny when listening to vocal music. Although any dance track is amazing out of these. Overall great product and the pros easily outweigh the cons, considering buying a third!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: No good for ambient nosie when sleeping, always on status lights.
customer_reviews.text: You can disable the mood lighti9, you can't disable the Bluetooth or bass lights, I shouldn't have to measure cut and stich a piece of fabric just to stop the thing producing light, it needs a night mode, I don't need a light to tell me its on when it is connected I CAN HEAR IT. it's a really stupid design oversight for people who would want to use it as a white noise device but can't do so out of the box. It's not even a cost issue it's a lack of thought and planning issue which does not fill me with confidence as to the quality and lifespan of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker. Would recommend downloading soundcore app to enhance experience
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker with fantastic sound and not too heavy to carry round. Nice variety of stock light modes with added layer of customisation if you download the app. Has a spin the bottle style game via the app also which is a nice touch. App has good info about the speaker like battery life and ability to turn it off via mobile. Buttons on speaker respond well and feels very high wuality. This is now our second Anker speaker in our household and doubt we would use a different brand. Very good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Maxii Louch

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a wireless speaker with excellent sound quality and I am not disappointed to have chosen Soundcore Flare 2. However, the button for skipping tracks is also the same for pausing and it makes it very annoying to use as it keeps pausing instead of skipping. The battery life for such a high profile speaker should definitely be better than this as well. In all, it’s very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ojotule Noel

customer_reviews.title: Flare2 doesn’t support stereo, despite Amazon listing saying it does.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product but unlike the Flare+ it doesn’t do stereo, despite the Amazon listing saying it does (as at July 2020). This was key to my decision in purchasing but had to return in favour of the Flare+. If you want to pair 100 speakers (who wouldn’t?) then the Flare2 is for you. But if, like me, stereo is more important (albeit from 2 speakers), then the Flare+ is what you need. But both sound excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tu

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great little product and a great price. No it isn’t a top end sound but it is surprisingly good and does a great job of spreading the sound evenly, no matter how it is positioned. Being water resistant is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. Parr

customer_reviews.title: Very, very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought two to use as a pair, though found out they don't create stereo audio. And, when connected to either my phone or computer, there is about a 0.5-1 second delay in the audio that makes them functionally useless for everything other than non-video music. Do not recommend whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth more money for sure! 5*
customer_reviews.text: W0W! 😳 My partner told me to get this and all I can say is I’m so glad he did! I was going to pay out £170 for another speaker, I am so impressed with this! Looks and feels amazing! The sound is even better! Will be buying more for around the house for sure ☺️ 5* From me!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good value, average sound
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is reasonably priced, but a little disappointed in the bass reproductions. I’ve had smaller speakers that have fared better in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Anand P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, worth buying, but needs improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, clear sound, decent quality, easy to connect. However the inbuilt microphone is poor quality and doesn't pick up unless you're sitting next to it, the buttons on the top are impossible to see easily, could be better value for money, and the app is pretty pointless unless you're really into changing its led colours.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jonathan M N Carver

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound relative to the price and size, very happy with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mr W

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant sound quality and bass fit the money, longest I've used it for is 8hrs with volume on 60% and bass boost on and it still have 30% battery when I turned it off! Very customisable with the app and buttons are very good without being too get your phone out to change track.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth getting
customer_reviews.text: Amazing love all the features can't wait to get another to try out the multi connection
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Duxbury

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good. Keep the "bass" option on as it makes everything sound a lot better. Gets very loud while keeping the sound quality. Got about 10-12 hours of on time with volume at about 30%, anything more than that is too loud if the speaker is not more than 2 meters away
customer_reviews.author: alex.kotrulev

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and great for bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: Paired with my phone easily and works excellently. No issues with battery life so far.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good sound.  Good value
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent compared to previous generation flare and other great sounding speakers I have. However, the unit I received had very poor battery life even with LEDs off.
customer_reviews.author: I Do Not Have Smelly Feet

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. Love the RGB. Nothing I can find wrong about it
customer_reviews.author: Alex Baldry

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and sound great. First switch away from JBL Flip and very impressed so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound, a little distorted at high levels, but overall nice speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Miss L Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: The Anker Soundcore Flare 2 is better than any portable bluetooth speaker that I have used. The supporting app is easy to find and setup for tweaking the settings and light shows :) I've had it for a few weeks now and so far and only needed to charge battery once. I haven't tested how waterproof it is, and personally don't want to try, so don't ask. YouTube videos demonstrate it being submerged if you wanna try! If you spend a little extra to get this speaker... its definitely worth it... I've recommended it to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth less than 4.0
customer_reviews.text: The sound of this device is quite good, and has many nice functionalities like connectivity to Google. However, the bluetooth technology seems to be less than 4.0 as it breaks at distance of less than 1m in open fields. Consider having your phone really close to your Flare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great sound
customer_reviews.text: The hype is true for once. A great little rechargeable bluetooth speaker. Great sound, punchy bass.
customer_reviews.author: G. Moore

customer_reviews.text: Best portable speaker available, the bass is great without any distortion, it’s very loud, never need to go higher than 40% volume, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Luke Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker Pros. - Type C Charging - Great Sound ( A little louder and a bit more bass than the first flare.) - The lights look way better than the first flare. - Power button is on the top so its easier to turn on compared to the first which has it on the back. - Being able to turn it off from the Souncore App. - I don't like getting my speakers wet but it is IPX7 so that's a plus. - Great if you're only planning on buying one. Cons. - No stereo mode - Battery for me was bad, I only got about 5 to 6 hours at 80 to 100% Volume. (With the lights on)
customer_reviews.author: Lalo Tello

customer_reviews.title: **AMAZING**
customer_reviews.text: This thing blew my socks off. I really did not expect this to sound this damn good. My dad, who is an audio engineer, was even impressed and started inquiring about what brand it was, how much it cost, etc.
customer_reviews.author: WaterSoluble

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal with 1 Software Issue
customer_reviews.text: Massive thank you to the Anker team for another fantastic product. I have only purchased anker power banks and now this product and couldn’t be more pleased. The sound quality is fantastic. I am truly impressed. My ONLY complaint, if you can call it that, is not being able to set my own colors for the lighting unless I am mistaken. However sound quality is phenomenal. I regularly purchase $200 portable speakers sounding like trash compared to this. The bang for the buck is better than most and close to none.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Gurley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers but small delay on sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they are awesome. Sound quality is very good and they look amaizing at night. I'm giving 4 stars because I notice a small delay of about 1.5 seconds in the sound when watching videos or movies, I had not noticed before with any other speaker I have had. Delay is more subtle when using only 1, but it's more notieable when using the 2 in PartyCast. Hopefully can be improved with future firmware upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this speaker. It's got plenty of volume for just me on my back patio, which is what I wanted it for. The "bass boost" is negligible, but the sound is not tinny to begin with. The lights are cool. The battery charges fast and lasts for hours. I didn't want to spend a fortune on a speaker that I'd want to cart to the beach and have outside, and this definitely fits the bill. Well worth it. After reading other reviews, I might eventually order more so I can string them together. I feel like with a whole party of people, which is currently impossible anyway, I might need more volume.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Was initially disappointed but Company doing all they can to make my experience better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker after reading many reviews of outdoor speakers. Led to believe it was great sound value for money, for those on a budget, which is me. This speaker was a sad disappointment at first, but it could be that I wasn't charging it properly or my charging cable was at fault. After I wrote poor review for the speaker, the company contacted me to replace the speaker for free if I wanted. I sincerely appreciate the generosity and belief in their products. We are working together to resolve this and I have to say they have really gone out of their way to help, a customer could not ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Brown

customer_reviews.title: The best bluetooth speaker I ever had 🤗
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bluetooth speaker! Good job Anker 💪 I like its desig specially the light show 🤗. For the quality of music it is superb 👍 haven't tried its max volume but 50 to 70% is enough for a medium room. Its bass is very good and not overpowered 👍. You cannot notice delay when watching youtube or videos 🤗. Its worth the price. Hope this last for years. Recommend to improve soundcore app for more customizable light effects 😁
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Olavario

customer_reviews.title: Instructions Need Work
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you from the outset... The speakers sound great. The major issue, though, is that the instructions are quite poor in regard to attempting to connect more than one speaker to the "main speaker". There are virtually no words in the included product instructions and the pictures are extraordinarily confusing. Fortunately, my tip for all the purchasers of these speakers is to go to the Soundcore website which has the same instructions posted with words and sentences to explain how to do this. Why the website's instructions are not included with the product itself is beyond me, but it really should. Just some constructive criticism for Anker, which is a great company
customer_reviews.author: R. D. HERMAN

customer_reviews.title: UNRELIABLE AND NOT BLUETOOTH AND CONNECTIVITY FRIENDLY!
customer_reviews.text: I regret having bought these speakers. Since having them they have shown paired on my devices but would not connect when I select the appropriate device. Have unpaired and attempted to pair again, it even refuses to pair again. Each time you turn off your device you havr to try to pair them back. RIDICULOUS! WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THESE SPEAKERS. THERE ARE A LOT OF MORE BLUETOOTH FRIENDLY SPEAKERS ON THE MARKET.
customer_reviews.author: C-P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome-sounding speaker
customer_reviews.text: The bass and sound in general is better than any other <$100 bluetooth speaker I've had. You can scroll between different lighting effects or turn them off. My only complaint is that the "next track" button is the same as the play/pause button, but you have to push it twice quickly. If you don't do it just right it simply pauses the track, and you're not sure if the next track is loading or the current one is paused. I charged it up about a week ago and have used it ~20min a day. Still going strong, so battery life seems to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is meh...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old Bose Soundlink Mini II that sounds quite a bit better. The Bose was a more expensive speaker, at $130, so perhaps that's to be expected. I could get two of the Flare 2 and link them, and it would certainly be louder, but it still won't sound as good as the Bose. I was hoping the tech had advanced to the point where great sound could be had for less, but what you really get is a decent but not great sounding speaker that has pretty lights and can be linked.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Male

customer_reviews.title: Speaker crashes when volume is loud
customer_reviews.text: Nice lights. Decent sound quality for indoor use but definitely not great for outdoor use, the sound doesn’t carry very far. Battery doesn’t last very long when volume is high so a little disappointed there. I’ve only had speaker a few weeks now and it crashes and shuts off (sometimes restarts) when I turn the volume anywhere past the halfway point. I tried charging it fully before use and it hasn’t solved the issue. I suppose without the crashing issue it would be worth it for the cost, but I’m rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Montano

customer_reviews.title: Very nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good speaker. For the price it is plenty loud and has decent sound. The app for it is super intuitive and easy to use. The only complaint I have is the fact that there is no audio jack, sure the speaker is fairly small but there's no reason there couldn't have been an audio jack on it. Outside of that, I love it and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these at the same time for my business. They both worked very well for a few weeks. Now, only one of them is working properly. The second one is no longer connecting well, it has the sound of static coming through it, as well as what I can only describe as a skipping sound. Keep in mind, they connected very well at first, and have been placed in the same location each time in my business. One still sounds great and performs daily very well, but the other one has failed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Dalwrymple

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to see the buttons
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this speaker, but with the dozens of LEDs they built into this they somehow never thought to put any kind of lighting into the controls on the top. You actually need to shine a flashlight at this to see the buttons. Maybe this is why Anker/Soundcore opted to show photos of every side of this except the power and volume buttons. 1 MONTH UPDATE: Being unable to see power & volume buttons drives me crazy. Anker/Soundcore needs to fix this design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Marque

customer_reviews.title: Might need to buy another!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister for her graduation and it is awesome. sounds great looks great and the colors are cool. My sister took it to the river recently didnt take it in the water but a dog did grab it and run off with it got sand all up in it. and did get a tad wet. she told me this 3 days after I got it for her. I then went to inspect it and it's still looked fine. she told me she just shook the sand off and it never stopped playing music.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good speakers
customer_reviews.text: The price is right on this really good sounding speakers and the battery life is amazing. I have had them for over a month and have not had to charge them yet. I do find keeping them synched to be a bit of a bother. I have two of them. Having more would be a job indeed. They have a great app. It would be great to see the technology get to the point where you could synch them through the app. All in all a great buy and quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects and bad battery?
customer_reviews.text: It is high quality which I like because I had the flare plus The lights are better and overall improvved The main issue is battery life about 5 hours in and I need to charge again Cuts off and pause randomly too Overall pretty good needs improvements tho
customer_reviews.author: Nesto

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the rgb color and the little speaker sounds good and is loud. I use it with my iPad and no issues connects automatically when i turn it on. The turn on sounds loud have not read the instructions so not sure if that can be adjusted. I actually liked it so much i did order a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Petrowitsch

customer_reviews.title: This thing can fill a room, and it's only larger than an energy drink can!
customer_reviews.text: Let me get the overall summary here: This thing sounds great, the lighting effects are awesome, and this thing is still portable enough for travel! I love the construction of this thing. The fabric finish feels premium and the bass is balanced yet pronounced. This is the my budget speaker king.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Le

customer_reviews.title: powerful and clear
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is great! Crystal clear sound with some good bass too. The light colors and features with that are really neat. I am impressed!! We got the Anker A-7908 small square bluetooth speaker for our wedding 5 years ago and thought it was good, this thing blows that one out of the water! Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erocka5

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I would like to see more pre-configured equalizer settings. The defaults are fine, and it's nice it includes a manual function, but that is simply too much work out the box. Good lows, highs could be clearer. I like how they can sync as I want two of these on our deck on opposite sides.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Mast

customer_reviews.title: new, fun, good looks & sound
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Shipping packaging just right, very little waste and easy to open. Item came in OEM packaging, all documentation included. Unit functions as described, no faults occurred in the trial period, I highly recommend this soundcore flair 2 speaker to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Tucson Citizen

customer_reviews.title: They have decent sound not audiophile but good for the price The selling feature is the multilink.
customer_reviews.text: I think for a party it would be better i am using 2 of the for my pc setup. Sometimes they fall out of sync for some amount of time. You can hear when they snap back. When they are out you get like a cave ecco. I think this is a software thing that can be fixed easley.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is really good for 50-65 dollars, when you throw in the lights and connectivity features, it's a good deal. The battery life is okay, but for a cheap, non-eavesdropping alternative to systems like Alexa or Sonos, you get whole home audio. At least that's the theory, when I get another and see the connectivity range between devices, that will be tested.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great - running multiple units simultaneously should be easier
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and while I'm satisfied overall, I with that once you create a networked collection, that network would be remembered after powering off. Unfortunately, that only works until you power off, or batteries die. Every time you start up, you have to designate the primary and then connect the secondary units back to the primary.
customer_reviews.author: Safariari

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced speaker with garbled sound
customer_reviews.text: Within 30 minutes of turning this speaker on for the first time, I started getting garbled, distorted sound. I decided to charge it for a while to see if it fixed the issue, but it persisted. Even before this issue started occurring, I wasn’t exactly thrilled with the sound quality. All things considered, I feel this product is overpriced and will be returning it promptly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I 1000% would recommend this speaker, the colors are great, the sound and base level is great, and I can confirm that it is actually waterproof as on a lazy river it came out of the plastic I had put it in and spent at least an hour in half melted cooler water.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Larson

customer_reviews.title: It's as good as all the reviews say
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a Bluetooth speaker. When I read the reviews about this, they were so good I decided to purchase it. It has exceeded my expectations. It's easy to set up, easy to use, and the sound is terrific. I would definitely buy it again, and would recommend it to anyone looking for a Bluetooth speaker at a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: GradProf

customer_reviews.title: Most frustrating set of speakers ever!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these speakers...when they work. The problem is, that majority of the time, they don't. I cannot get them to pair for the life of me. I do what the instructions say, I even contacted the manufacturer and did a hard reset like they recommended. I even returned the original set and got a replacement set, and I still have the same issue. When these work, they're great. But I get so frustrated when I go to use them because I never know if they're going to actually work or not. You'd think they'd be as easy as turn on and use. But they're not. So not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice speaker. Looks sleek. Great sound. Cool colors on the top and bottom which you can change the pattern of the lights and colors via the app on your phone. My main issue is that I connected this to my apple TV and now it won't connect back to my phone or MacBook. I'll hold on the bluetooth button and try and connect from my other device but its never able to connect. Gonna have to end up returning this because of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Neetan

customer_reviews.title: Nice loud Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This Anker Soundcore FLARE 2 is very loud. This thing can amplify your whole room and the next door room. My co worker is very surprised on how much volume this thing can raise up to. It’ll be shaking the ground. You can hold a mini concert with this thing. Love it very much, always been a fan of anker products. Long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound,Poor touch controls
customer_reviews.text: Sound is 360 degrees and great Bluetooth feature. Cons: touch controls on top are difficult to see. They need to be larger and lit. No verbal user instructions/ pictures only which are impossible to understand. App layout needs to be more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular sound!
customer_reviews.text: The product is really good. It’s very loud even at half volume, the sound quality is great and even has EQ settings to adjust. But out of the box it’s sounds great ! Works really easily with my iPhone and the led lights are pretty neat and can be turned off... overall a great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: I watched a bunch of reviews and bought this along with a UE. This speaker is so good. The sound is awesome. Bass is great. 360 sound is awesome. I really didn't expect the speaker to be this good. The UE went back.
customer_reviews.author: mek

customer_reviews.title: For good for price
customer_reviews.text: overall I love this little speaker. Its light but not so light it will fall over if a table is bumped into. The audio quality is excellent from all sides and doesn't get distorted at high volume. The speaker is also water and beer proof, friends have accidently spilled beer and water and many other beverages on my speaker and it still sounds and works good. Battery life is better than most for a speaker this size it last long when its not at max volume, but when it is mine lasted anywhere from 2-8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R

customer_reviews.title: Great sound (and lightshow) at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: SOLID speaker! The sound that pumps out of this thing is insane and the color rings are a great aesthetic touch. I needed waterproof specifically and the Flare 2 has not disappointed. The charging port seals and has stayed dry. Prolonged use will make the battery drain at a modest pace, but it isn't a deal breaker as it charges quickly. If you're in the market for a Bluetooth speaker, but this now. Zero remorse.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Powerful wireless speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly loud for a small bluetooth speaker. Setup takes just a few seconds, and it can easily be heard dozens of feet away. Anker makes quality products. The soundcore app (iphone 6S+) is needed to change equalizer settings. Don’t know if it keeps the settings for other devices connected via bluetooth. Downside: No 3.5mm audio jack.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers. I use them with my tablet to watch movies and TV shows and listen to music. As a bonus, they light up and glow in the dark. I would definitely recommend them to fellow millennials or parents with young children.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Hines

customer_reviews.title: Thing kicks for it size
customer_reviews.text: This thing kicks for it size easy to bring with you battery was not as long as it claims but still good .one improvement would be to add lighted power button and a cloth loop to carry the speaker
customer_reviews.author: WJD

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great
customer_reviews.text: I just got this, if I hadn't wasted time trying to connect to the App, I would be even happier! Basically turn it on and grab in on your phone. I can't talk to battery life yet, as we just got it, but it looks great, sounds even better and the lights are a nice benefit for the patio at night. Looking forward to summer on our new patio with great music sound!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Nifty product
customer_reviews.text: Pairing can be a bit challenging at first, but once you master that you are all set. It is what I expect and Anker products have great battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Kcurry333

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and bass !
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is compact with great sound. Not quite as good sound as the JBL flip, although for a lot less money and worth every penny. We did a lot of looking around before buying our next bluetooth speaker and this model does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Only Bluetooth input.
customer_reviews.text: Because it has a USB-C and not audio input jack. I thought it work with a USB-c with audio jack and it don't work with it to input sound like that.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Day

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker
customer_reviews.text: We got this speaker and ended up getting a second since they can link to others speakers (same kind). This allows us to have sound on our patio with out having to blast one speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Sacco

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker I bought to take to the beach. It is a little smaller than it looks in the picture, but that is a good thing. Similar in size to the JBL. Decent sound tone. The light function is a little intense when on the EQ mode, so I probably won't use that much.
customer_reviews.author: J Moore

customer_reviews.title: Colors and sound beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this speaker for my daughter. She LOVES IT the colors are beautiful the sound is loud and clear. Coolest speaker worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Chandler

customer_reviews.title: All around great speaker for a portable!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound with excellent clarity and battery life. Fills my small living room with clear sound and plenty of depth.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Party mode
customer_reviews.text: Excellent system with great sound quality for the money. Remember "Party Mode" is not stereo mode.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Party like a rockstar
